hero.subtitle: I specialize in creating innovative solutions designed to streamline processes, drive digital transformation, and enhance the customer experience.

sayHello.actionText: I just wanted to say hello
sayHello.secondMessage: Well hello there, nice to meet you!ðŸ‘‹
sayHello.thirdMessage: Thanks for looking at my personal website.
sayHello.fourthMessage: I hope you enjoy my work.
sayHello.fifthMessage: Can I help you with anything else?

showCV.actionText: I want to see your CV.
showCV.firstMessage: Hey, im interested in your CV!
showCV.secondMessage: Thanks for reaching out to me.
showCV.thirdMessage: Underneath you can download my CV.

directChat.actionText: I want to talk to you directly.
directChat.firstMessage: I really like your Chatbot, but i would rather talk to you directly.
directChat.secondMessage: Sad times, but I respect your decision.
directChat.thirdMessage: Send my creator a message and he will answer as soon as possible!
